FileUpload.browserNotSupported: It seems your browser or app doesn’t support in-app recording.
FileUpload.pleaseDoNotClose: It will take a few minutes, please do not close the app.
FileUpload.deleteConfirmation: Are you sure you want to delete this file?
FileUpload.fileNotSupported: Sorry, you can’t upload that kind of file. You can upload any of the following files: {{formatsxxx}}
FileUpload.videoTooLarge: Sorry, that video is too large. Reduce to size of your video to {{sizexxx}} or less or select a different one.
FileUpload.photoTooLarge: Sorry, that photo is too large. Reduce to size of your photo to {{sizexxx}} or less or select a different one.
FileUpload.yourUploadWillBeRemoved: Your uploaded file would be removed
FileUpload.yourUploadWillBeRemovedIfModalClosed: Your uploaded file will be removed if you close this view
FileUpload.pleaseUploadFile: Please upload a file before continuing
FileUpload.only1FileAccepted: Sorry, you can’t upload multiple files. Please select a single file.
FileUpload.leaveConfirmation: Are you sure you want to leave?
FileUpload.videoIsNotSupported: Sorry, your browser can’t play this type of video file
